description: Participation in online modules and workshops covering professional skills topics like project planning, teamwork strategies, report writing, and cultural awareness (for international programs). Requires satisfactory participation for a passing grade.

Weekly reflective posts (300 words or 2-3 minute videos) documenting application of science knowledge, preparation skills, workplace challenges/successes, and professional growth. Requires satisfactory completion of all 4 portfolio activities.
Workplace supervisor's evaluation of student professionalism and performance using program-specific rubrics. May be assessed as group work for team-based placements.
